text: Nabo balamaanga ebilali Nyasaye tawe, ebilanyala okhubakhola shiosi shiosi tawe, nohomba okhubakhoonya tawe, Nebaboolanga mbu; “bano nibo abakhusabila imbeli wa Nyasaye” Boola; “Koo mubolelanga Nyasaye akakorerwe mwikulu nende khushialo? Oluyali nolulwe abula obuleemu, ne niwoluyali muno khu ako akabamutsokasinjia ninako.”
